data.title: Do not allow specs to leave before game starts
data.body: It crashes the game if specs leave before the game starts for real. Why not just say, wait a few more seconds before you can leave?

data.title: FATAL ERROR, CRASH WHEN ATTEMPTING TO BROWSE MAPS TO CREATE GAME
data.body:
Hi all, Not sure if my previous post was received as my internet disconnected? Please help with my fatal error every time i browse maps to create a new game. The problem started after i added the 40 red alert maps pack from Sleipnir's stuff a few days ago Even after deleting the added maps and reinstalling open ra, the game still crashing when map browsing. In fact the fatal error happens the moment i click on the maps button. Please see my error log below. Thanks. 
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20131223
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 2.0.50727.6387
Exception of type `System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException`: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowKeyNotFoundException()
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)
   at OpenRA.FileFormats.TileSet.GetTerrainType(TileReference`2 r)
   at OpenRA.Graphics.Minimap.TerrainBitmap(Map map, Boolean actualSize)
   at OpenRA.Widgets.MapPreviewWidget.LoadAsyncInternal()
   at System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart_Context(Object state)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
   at System.Threading.ThreadHelper.ThreadStart()
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20131223
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 2.0.50727.6387
Exception of type `System.AccessViolationException`: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt.
   at Tao.Sdl.Sdl.SDL_GL_SwapBuffers()
   at OpenRA.Renderer.SdlCommon.SdlGraphics.Present()
   at OpenRA.Graphics.Renderer.EndFrame(IInputHandler inputHandler)
   at OpenRA.Game.Tick(OrderManager orderManager)
   at OpenRA.Game.Run()
   at OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   at OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)

data.title: fix Eventbounds
data.body:
Closes #4987
Small portion of Production tab on Right side unresponsive (RA, D2K)
modified Buildpalettewidget.cs  (paletteOrigin.Y), 215 -> (paletteOrigin.Y), 239

Thanks ScottNZ for assisting

data.title: Add hijacker
data.body:
Intended to be a complement to #5023. I'd like to have both #5023 and this PR in before the playtest is released. Both this patch and #5023 are response patches to the husk restoration ability added to engineers in RA.

This hijacker has the thief/safe cameo which isn't really ideal, but we can always fix it later.

data.title: RA - moved husk capturing from engineer to mechanic
data.body: This is part of #4877

data.title: Fixed unconditional updates of the shroud
data.body:
Added an INotifyMovement interface and use it to only update the shroud
when it actually needs updating, ie. when an actor has moved.

Thanks to @pchote and @phrohdoh for guidance on irc.

data.title: Fix mobile SAM icon override.
data.body: Fixes #5004.

data.title: Various balance changes
data.body:
See CHANGELOG

Not sure what to do about naval units yet so that's omitted

data.title: Add RA map - Seaside 2
data.body:
3v3 map (re-imagining of the first version) featuring gem mines in the middle.

Editor preview:
![map](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/566742/2599304/9d28931a-badd-11e3-81b8-146a4b8c2e04.png)

data.title: AI fires on stealth unit even when cloaked
data.body:
Reproduce by creating a stealth tank, set stance to holdfire, then drive it into the enemy's base. Unsure if base defenses are supposed to cause the stealth tank to decloak, but even without base defenses, the enemy AI will build some units, then start firing on the exact location of the stealth tank. 

Same thing for other units that have received a stealth crate as well. 

<bountysource-plugin>

---

Want to back this issue? **[Place a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1455144-ai-fires-on-stealth-unit-even-when-cloaked?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).

data.title: Hotfix for shellmaps
data.body: Uh, pretty messy. I was not sure what to do, so I just set all the stuffs so it worked.

data.title: Temporarily disable the desert shellmap Lua script
data.body: until #4965 is resolved to get a playtest release ASAP.

data.title: Fixed missing disabled overlay for TD defenses
data.body: #5005 introduced by #4673.

data.title: Update changelog for recent C&C merges.
Pushing helicopter off the map
data.body: To keep it simple, it is possible to push other helicopter off the map, causing them to be unselectable. I have a replay showing this where i accidently put a few longbows on the bottom of the map causing one to get pushed outside of it

data.title: "Always show status bar" bug
data.body:
healthbars should be covered by the shroud when a unit is still under it : 
![bar](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1997864/2580419/662e69d8-b9ad-11e3-944f-17034cb1c551.png)

data.title: Split ShpImageWidget into SpriteWidget and SpriteSequenceWidget.
data.body: This gives ShpImageWidget and the asset browser logic a much needed cleanup, and animates the C&C color picker preview.

data.title: Allow Chinook to land in tiberium
data.body: Seems to not make sense that it can't land in tiberium, especially since Chem Troopers can walk through it undamaged, and since tiberium is not quite as deadly in recent patches.

data.title: Give ARTY a 75% chance of exploding
data.body: The odds of exploding should be high, but not 100%, I think.

data.title: obelisk displayed as powered when low power
data.body: It wasn't darkened like the com center and wasn't firing.

data.title: mobile sam has ssm launcher icon
Added checks for valid targets to C4 demolition
data.body: Try to catch `target == null` cases as described in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/4975#issuecomment-39081921

data.title: Catched null reference exception in RefreshServerListInner
data.body: introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/commit/21063931222ba56bcdde8fa473eed9ebfb447fa4#diff-6a1ab3db9f64e75b90a55f4b0f125195R129

data.title: Added checks for valid targets when flying
data.body: as proposed in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/4972#issuecomment-38972222

data.title: Ingame map editor : layers
data.body:
Could the ingame map editor feature "layers" in order to be able to move several tiles at once without deleting them and redrawing them elsewhere ?
- we could show/hide layers
- move them elsewhere

This could help moving actors faster:
![01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1732773/2566454/70bb10ba-b8c5-11e3-92a3-41381eedb7a0.gif)

data.title: Moved StartGameNotification into its own trait
data.body: as proposed in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4496/files#r11108053

data.title: Perform file globbing when converting png to shp
data.body: Closes #4615
